name: Naluri Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a digital therapeutics platform designed to connect employees or policy-holders with health psychologists. The company's platform combines behavioral science, data science, and digital design, as well as offers coaching to lose weight and helps organizations predict, prevent, and manage the leading cardiometabolic and mental health conditions, enabling users to achieve and sustain health outcomes such as better stress management, and reduction in blood pressure or blood sugar levels.
one_liner: Developer of a digital therapeutics platform designed to connect employees or policy-holders with health psychologists. The company's platform combines behavioral science, data science, and digital design, as well as offers coaching to lose weight and helps organizations predict, prevent, and manage the leading cardiometabolic and mental health conditions, enabling users to achieve and sustain health outcomes such as better stress management, and reduction in blood pressure or blood sugar levels.
